name: Job.com, Inc.
overview:
Job.com, one of the fastest-growing career portals on the Internet, connects talent from across the U.S. with companies looking to hire. Based out of Fredericksburg, Virginia, Job.com is an industry leading career portal. Job.com has more than 29 Million register users and nearly 9 Million resumes in its database.

Job.com and our career network of over 150 niche and regionally-focused career sites make it easy for employers to “Hire for Less” by providing a platform to post local job openings and search resumes of local candidates and reach millions of unique visitors every month. Local candidates have access to thousands of employers hiring in their area.

Job.com provides value-based recruitment packages, so employers of all company sizes can advertise their job openings and search Job.com’s growing database of resumes at a fraction of the cost of other career sites.
